name: movies_get_popularity
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool flixster.
Tool description: This API helps to query for movies, actors, theaters, showtime, etc... to create a site/application, such as : rottentomatoes.com, flixster.com
API description: Fetches popular movies based on location parameters such as zipcode, radius, longitude, and latitude, using the Flixster API.

zipcode.description: The postal code of the area to search in. Defaults to '90002'.

radius.description: The radius (in miles) around the given zipcode to include in the search. Defaults to 50.

longitude.description: The geographical longitude to search movies around. Defaults to None.

latitude.description: The geographical latitude to search movies around. Defaults to None.
